item.title: Lt. Morales - Heroes of the Storm
item.description:
Lt. Morales - Heroes of the Storm

Lt. Morales joined the United Earth Directorate (UED) to make a difference and protect her family. Over a very long and storied career, she has distinguished herself as a peerless medic, able to keep her patients alive and in the fight long after anyone else would have gone down. Lt.

item.title: Heroes of the Storm Patch released: Addition of a new character | GearNuke
item.description:
Heroes of the Storm Patch released: Addition of a new character | GearNuke

Heroes of the Storm's latest patch revealed a new character in the game: StarCraft's Medic who is known as Lt. Morales. She is a healing-centric support character who is also capable of transporting her entire team across the map using her new and amazing talent called "dropship".
